name: Nuki
description:
Hello, we are currently working on a

3D horror action/adventure game Nuki!

.features

  • Atmospheric visuals and music. 
  • Flowable advanced gameplay with dynamic top down camera.
  • Horror fictional story with over time unfolding plot.
  • Story based riddles and environment exploration puzzles.

by Moon Dagger Studio
